basics.name: Shohanul Alam
basics.label: Web Application Developer
basics.summary: Passionate self-taught Web Application Developer. Love to code with JavaScript, Php and Python. Expertise in both front-end and back-end framworks and libraries like Bootstrap, Codeigniter, JQuery, Ajax and also interested in Django and Laravel.
